text: @LadyRebecca_1 @HHepplewhite Lady Rebecca, I am with you 100% as I am sure most people are. If he hasn't got COVID19 I do hope he takes time off to get therapy and rest as I am worried about the state of his mental health. His viewing figures have dropped dramatically, that will hurt him but I wish him well
